items.preText: Good decision by Mortaza to not review the previous over. That was turning past leg stump by Mehidy.
items.text: strays on the pads again and is picked off to fine leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, angled across, he stood tall and punched it, but Mehidy at point dived to his right to prevent a possible boundary
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: angled across him again, he defends outside off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: over the top and all the way stunning shot, slightly back of a length, he comes on the front foot and hits it on the up from outside off. Carries all the way over wide long-off
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, SIX runs

items.text: back of a length, patted back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: attempted yorker, dug out to mid-off for a single
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.preText: rana1171: "it might sound silly, but what if bangladesh start with spinners in wc too! none seems expecting it. could be a good tactic considering bd strength."
items.text: sweeps it with the turn and nails it nicely, sending to deep square leg for a boundary
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, he goes back in his crease to whip it to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller length on the pads, tapped back to the bowler's right. He dives and mis-fields, padding the ball away, that allows a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller angling into the batsman, defended into the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: quicker one, drags it short. Bravo defends from the crease
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller ball, Bravo drives it gently into the off side
items.postText: Akshay to take you through now
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: short of good length, nips away and squares him up as it beats the outside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: good length on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: shortish on middle and leg, pulled off the hips to deep square
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short of length outside off, punched to deep point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: length ball, slanted across on middle, defended
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, no run

items.text: short of good length outside off, punched to deep point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: length, spinning in, pushed to mid-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: drills this back of a length ball back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: slider, goes to midwicket off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: slashes it away to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: full, sliding into middle, pushed back off the inside of the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: short of a length on middle and leg, punched to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run
